name: DT Author Box
author: Digital Tweaker

sections.description:
** No Longer Supported **
DT Author Box is great for those who have multiple authors on a WordPress site and want to show author information at the bottom of every post for each author like a signature. This can include an image, a short bio, a link to the author’s website and their social profiles.

Social Profiles Added

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • LinkedIn
  • Google+
  • YouTube
  • Pinterest

Language Support

  • German
  • Spanish
  • French
  • Indonesian
  • Italian – Thanks to Marco Pegoraro for accurate translation
  • Portuguese

Language translation may not be exact, Google Translate was used. If you find any errors, please let me know.

DT Author Box Plugin Homepage
sections.installation: Visit DT Author Box Plugin Homepage
sections.faq: Visit DT Author Box Plugin Homepage
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Fixed Social buttons missing
  • Fixed previous deleted image and twitter information

1.2

  • Major bug fixes
  • Removed all backlinks
  • Added more socal profiles (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, YouTube, Pinterest)
  • Added Social profile buttons

1.1.4

  • Fixed Profile Upload Image Button

1.1.3

  • Fixed Fatal Error along with others

1.1.2

  • Fixed dtpixel error

1.1.0

  • Major Bug Fixes

1.0.2

  • Added support for 6 new languages

1.0.1

  • Minor bug fixes

1.0

  • First Release

short_description: Easily add an author box bio signature with custom profile image and social profile buttons to the end of each author's posts
